summary: This mod adds a male Uruk-Hai and 2 female Uruk-Hai -Followers, a female orc was actualy a request i recently got, but to give it a special twist I decided to make Uruks out of them.
descriptionHtml:
[b]PLEASE READ THE REQUIREMENTS BEFORE COMPLAINING AND DON 'T JUST HIT SUBSCRIBE!!![/b]

[b]WIP[/b]
==============================================================================
[b]What this mod does:[/b]
==============================================================================

At the moment this mod adds some Uruk-hai to the "Sleeping Giant Inn" in Riverwood. But this location will change sooner or later...

Some of them look similar to the LOTR-Uruk-Hai and some might be normal Orcs. The lighter Units don 't wear the typical Uruk-Hai-Armor.

I added several Uruk-Hai-Warriors, Orcs and Shaman-Orcs yet. Everyone can be choosen as a follower.

[b]I searched the nexus and steam for cool armor that matches the style of the Uruk-hai beeing different at the same time, to provide more diversity, but I didn 't find much stuff. If you find weapons or armor that matches the style, please tell me. If I like it i will add it. THX![/b]

==============================================================================
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>[b]REQUIREMENTS:[/b]<<<<<<< MOST IMPORTANT, you need it!!!!!!
==============================================================================
[b]Good comments and ratings on new weapons, armor and many other stuff belongs to all the following mod-authors, please endorce their awesome work, if you like it![/b]

[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24335/?]Orcish Blademaster armor and weapons standalone by lamer1000[/url]

This mod provids new orcish weapons i added.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65157/?][img]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/c6c3a9c5d605d6061c3665268d6cc086.gif[/img][/url]

==============================================================================
[b]RECOMMENDED MODS: [/b]
==============================================================================

[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29006/?] female orc-face-textures by fgem[/url]

This mod makes the female orks still look wild and fearce, but less ugly like the vanilla ones!

==============================================================================
[b]THANKS FOR MODS USED IN DEPENDENCY:[/b]
==============================================================================

[b]Big thanks to:

[b]lamer1000 [/b] for his Ork Blademaster weapons (mod is already dependent to)

==============================================================================
[b]THANKS FOR PERMISSION TO INCLUD TO MY MOD:[/b]
==============================================================================

Big thanks to:

Mandarinn[/b] for his awesome Uruk-Hai-Armor
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28793/?] Uruk-Hai Armo [/url] (already added)

[b]Halendia[/b] for permission to use her great eye-colour-ressource in my mod!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30823/?] Hale - Iridum Eyes[/url] (already added)

[b]zzjay[/b] for permission to use her Hair-ressource in my mod!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26689/?] Nouks hairstyles - Dreadlocks[/url] (already added)

...and secondly her "Draugr Armor Parts-Mod"
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40316/?]Draugr Armor Parts[/url] (not yet added)

[b]Lrsmways[/b] for permission to include some weapons from his weapon-mod in my mod!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19611/?] Expanded Skyrim Weaponry[/url] (not yet added)

==============================================================================
[b]PLEASE LEAVE A COMMENT AND RATE![/b]
==============================================================================

Have fun!! :)

Greets
Dest.
author: Destero

files.name: Desteros Uruk-Hai Follower_1_06
files.changelogHtml: I added missing textures, so all parts of armor and weapons will be shown correctly now. Just the "Orcish Blademaster Armor and weapons mod" is still needed.
